residentialServices.title: AC Gas Charging
residentialServices.shortDesc: Professional refrigerant gas charging service to restore proper cooling performance and energy efficiency.

residentialServices.title: Repair & Diagnosis (Sensor Repair)
residentialServices.shortDesc: Complete troubleshooting and repair of faulty temperature or control sensors for accurate cooling and smooth operation.

residentialServices.title: PCB Repair
residentialServices.shortDesc: Expert repair of AC circuit boards to fix power, startup, and electronic control issues.

residentialServices.title: Copper Piping (Per Ft)
residentialServices.shortDesc: High-quality copper piping installation or replacement for efficient refrigerant flow and long-lasting performance.

residentialServices.title: Fan Motor Repair
residentialServices.shortDesc: Repair or replacement of faulty fan motors to ensure smooth airflow and silent cooling.

residentialServices.title: Remote Control Replacement
residentialServices.shortDesc: Genuine AC remote control replacement with full compatibility and easy setup.

residentialServices.title: Smart AC Upgrade
residentialServices.shortDesc: Upgrade your regular AC to smart control with WiFi and mobile app access for convenient operation anytime, anywhere.
